00360 inline Arg::Arg(const std::string& flag, 
00361                 const std::string& name, 
00362                 const std::string& desc, 
00363                 bool req, 
00364                 bool valreq,
00365                 Visitor* v) :
00366   _flag(flag),
00367   _name(name),
00368   _description(desc),
00369   _required(req),
00370   _requireLabel("required"),
00371   _valueRequired(valreq),
00372   _alreadySet(false),
00373   _visitor( v ),
00374   _ignoreable(true),
00375   _xorSet(false),
00376   _acceptsMultipleValues(false)
00377 {
00378   if ( _flag.length() > 1 ) 
00379     throw(SpecificationException(
00380             "Argument flag can only be one character long", toString() ) );
00381 
00382   if ( _name != ignoreNameString() &&  
00383        ( _flag == Arg::flagStartString() || 
00384          _flag == Arg::nameStartString() || 
00385          _flag == " " ) )
00386     throw(SpecificationException("Argument flag cannot be either '" + 
00387                                  Arg::flagStartString() + "' or '" + 
00388                                  Arg::nameStartString() + "' or a space.",
00389                                  toString() ) );
00390 
00391   if ( ( _name.find( Arg::flagStartString(), 0 ) != std::string::npos ) || 
00392        ( _name.find( Arg::nameStartString(), 0 ) != std::string::npos ) ||
00393        ( _name.find( " ", 0 ) != std::string::npos ) )
00394     throw(SpecificationException("Argument name cannot contain either '" + 
00395                                  Arg::flagStartString() + "' or '" + 
00396                                  Arg::nameStartString() + "' or space.",
00397                                  toString() ) );
00398 
00399 }
00400 
00401 inline Arg::~Arg() { }
00402 
00403 inline std::string Arg::shortID( const std::string& valueId ) const
00404 {
00405   std::string id = "";
00406 
00407   if ( _flag != "" )
00408     id = Arg::flagStartString() + _flag;
00409   else
00410     id = Arg::nameStartString() + _name;
00411 
00412   std::string delim = " "; 
00413   delim[0] = Arg::delimiter(); // ugly!!!
00414   
00415   if ( _valueRequired )
00416     id += delim + "<" + valueId  + ">";
00417 
00418   if ( !_required )
00419     id = "[" + id + "]";
00420 
00421   return id;
00422 }
00423 
00424 inline std::string Arg::longID( const std::string& valueId ) const
00425 {
00426   std::string id = "";
00427 
00428   if ( _flag != "" )
00429     {
00430     id += Arg::flagStartString() + _flag;
00431 
00432     if ( _valueRequired )
00433       id += " <" + valueId + ">";
00434     
00435     id += ",  ";
00436     }
00437 
00438   id += Arg::nameStartString() + _name;
00439 
00440   if ( _valueRequired )
00441     id += " <" + valueId + ">";
00442       
00443   return id;
00444 
00445 }
00446 
00447 inline bool Arg::operator==(const Arg& a) const
00448 {
00449   if ( ( _flag != "" && _flag == a._flag ) || _name == a._name)
00450     return true;
00451   else
00452     return false;
00453 }
00454 
00455 inline std::string Arg::getDescription() const 
00456 {
00457   std::string desc = "";
00458   if ( _required )
00459     desc = "(" + _requireLabel + ")  ";
00460 
00461 //  if ( _valueRequired )
00462 //    desc += "(value required)  ";
00463 
00464   desc += _description;
00465   return desc; 
00466 }

00476 inline bool Arg::isSet() const 
00477 { 
00478   if ( _alreadySet && !_xorSet )
00479     return true;
00480   else
00481     return false;
00482 }

00488   _requireLabel = s;

00491 inline bool Arg::argMatches( const std::string& argFlag ) const
00492 {
00493   if ( ( argFlag == Arg::flagStartString() + _flag && _flag != "" ) ||
00494        argFlag == Arg::nameStartString() + _name )
00495     return true;
00496   else
00497     return false;
00498 }
00499 
00500 inline std::string Arg::toString() const
00501 {
00502   std::string s = "";
00503 
00504   if ( _flag != "" )
00505     s += Arg::flagStartString() + _flag + " ";
00506 
00507   s += "(" + Arg::nameStartString() + _name + ")";
00508 
00509   return s;
00510 }
00511 
00512 inline void Arg::_checkWithVisitor() const
00513 {
00514   if ( _visitor != NULL )
00515     _visitor->visit();
00516 }
00517 
00521 inline void Arg::trimFlag(std::string& flag, std::string& value) const
00522 {
00523   int stop = 0;
00524   for ( int i = 0; static_cast<unsigned int>(i) < flag.length(); i++ )
00525     if ( flag[i] == Arg::delimiter() )
00526       {
00527       stop = i;
00528       break;
00529       }
00530 
00531   if ( stop > 1 )
00532     {
00533     value = flag.substr(stop+1);
00534     flag = flag.substr(0,stop);
00535     }
00536 
00537 }
00538 
00542 inline bool Arg::_hasBlanks( const std::string& s ) const
00543 {
00544   for ( int i = 1; static_cast<unsigned int>(i) < s.length(); i++ )
00545     if ( s[i] == Arg::blankChar() )
00546       return true;
00547 
00548   return false;
00549 }

00551 inline void Arg::forceRequired()
00552 {
00553   _required = true;
00554 }
00555 
00556 inline void Arg::xorSet()
00557 {
00558   _alreadySet = true;
00559   _xorSet = true;
00560 }

00565 inline void Arg::addToList( std::list<Arg*>& argList ) const
00566 {
00567   argList.push_front( const_cast<Arg*>(this) );
00568 }

00570 inline bool Arg::allowMore()
00571 {
00572   return false;

00576 {
00577   return _acceptsMultipleValues;
